metadata.dc:author: Zornoza, G
Clemente, J L
Fakih, A
Lera, J M
Vicente, F
Goenea, I
Voltas, J
metadata.dc:description: The results of the surgical treatment of human hydatic cyst by cystojejunostomy are presented. This technique was performed in 17,3% of all cysts treated by the authors. The conditions for using technique, as well as it morbidity and mortality are reviewed. The authors' conclusion is that cystojejunostomy is a valid surgical technique for hydatic cyst in some cases in which it is indicated.
metadata.dc:title: Derivación interna en el tratamiento de las hidatidosis hepáticas.
[Internal derivation in the treatment of hepatic hydatidosis].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de medicina de la Universidad de Navarra
